text: León de Garro y Javier (?-?) was a Basque nobleman, Count of Javier and Viscount of Zolina. == Biography == León was born in Pamplona, Kingdom of Navarre, son of Jerónimo de Garro and Ana de Javier, belonging to the Basque nobility. He was married to the noble lady Inés de Coloma, daughter of don Pedro Coloma, Lord of Malon and Maria de Luna. In 1604, León de Garro was appointed Alcalde ordinario in Pamplona. == References == == External links == *navarchivo.com Category:Basque history Category:Basque people Category:People from Pamplona Category:Coloma family
title: León de Garro y Javier
